mapper.select: SELECT ec.id, ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num lessonNum, es2.title subjectLevelOne, es.title subjectLevelTwo, et.`name` teacherName, ec.price price, ecd.description description FROM `edu_course` ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ecd.id = ec.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es ON es.id = ec.subject_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON es2.id = ec.subject_parent_id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON et.id = ec.teacher_id WHERE ec.id=#{courseId}
